Nick, would this have anything to do with the Foundation changes that were made?
Looks like it.  I'll have a look.
XMLMemento.DOMWriter is not properly handling text nodes, which can be put in
the memento using XMLMemento.putTextData(String).
And the Display view does this.
Fixed.  It turns out it's non-trivial to handle a Text node and nice line breaks
and indenting at the same time, without corrupting the text value.
The DOMWriter has been fixed up to support this, but I've disabled indenting to
be closer to R3.0 behaviour (line breaks, but no indenting).

Filed bug 93262 to do some regression tests.
*** Bug 93412 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Verified that the regression tests pass in I20050513-0010.
